alert.note: Alert for Lower Yukon and Innoko Valleys (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 13 at 8:58PM AKST until January 14 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow with periods of freezing rain and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 inches and ice accumulations of one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting to 30 mph. * WHERE...Lower Yukon and Innoko Valleys. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult. Areas of blowing snow could reduce visibility. Snow drifts will form. Ice will accumulate on many surfaces and could cause power lines to fail.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.
